_meanings:
{@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a female
fiend, daughter of Suketu, wife
of Sunda and mother of Mārīca.
[She was changed into a fiend by the
sage Agastya whose devotions she had
disturbed. She was killed by Rāma
when she began to disturb the 
sacrificial rites of Viśvāmitra. Rāma was
first unwilling to bend his bow
against a {%woman%}, but the sage
overcame his scruples, see <ls>R. 11. 20</ls>].
